title: Unnamed bridge at Lévérogne
description: According to the Barrington Atlas directory, an ancient group of bridges crossing the river Duria (Bautica) is found at Villeneuve/Leverogne to the west of Aosta.

properties.description: The location of the modern village of Villeneuve derived from a node in OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Villeneuve
